# spicedb Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "spicedb" {
  endpoint = "localhost:50051"
  token    = "fake-token"
  insecure = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) SpiceDB gRPC API endpoint
- `token` (String) SpiceDB API token

### Optional

- `insecure` (Boolean) Connect over a plaintext connection
